name: MonMon (DakotaHall, atheniann, YasmeenLec)
description:
Embark on a journey alongside MonMon in a perilous world plagued by beasts that wreck havoc in the realm.  You are tasked with bringing peace to the poor inhabitants of the land in exchange for special abilities that derive their force straight from the moon.  

My best friend and I worked really hard on this game, we hope you enjoy it!

Controls

Meet Friendly Creatures

And Spooky Villains

Credits

dakotahall: Code & Design

YasmeenLec : Art & Design

atheniann : Music

SFX: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/fantasy-game-94186 & https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256

Source on Github: https://github.com/DakotaHall/MonMon
